name: Reunion (itch) (Games@MQ)
description:
Winner of MQ Games' "Reunion" Game Jam!

Help reunite people who have lost their friends or loved ones in a crowd of people.

Controls:
Movement: WASD / Arrow keys
Interact: E 

To interact with someone, make sure you are standing in front of them (not shoulder to shoulder). Get your face as close as possible to theirs. Eye contact isn't required but is nice to show you're involved in the conversation :)

Made by Mark Saba.
